results.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
results.original_title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
results.overview: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares to do battle with the First Order.

results.title: The Star
results.original_title: The Star
results.overview: A small but brave donkey and his animal friends become the unsung heroes of the greatest story ever told, the first Christmas.

results.title: Star Wars: The Force and the Fury
results.original_title: Star Wars: The Force and the Fury
results.overview: A Jedi  crash-lands on a planet and faces off against a Sith who has a grudge against him.

results.title: The Last Movie Star
results.original_title: The Last Movie Star
results.overview: Vic Edwards was one of the biggest movie stars in the world, known for his mustachioed good looks and cocky swagger. With his Hollywood glory a distant memory, the now-octogenarian Vic is prompted to reassess his life with the passing of his beloved dog and the arrival of an invitation to receive a lifetime achievement award from the (fictional) International Nashville Film Festival.

results.title: The Star Next Door
results.original_title: 이웃집 스타
results.overview: A top actress lives next door to a teenage tennis player named So-eun who is, in fact, her daughter. Mother and daughter don't quite get along.

results.title: Star Raiders: The Adventures of Saber Raine
results.original_title: Star Raiders: The Adventures of Saber Raine
results.overview: Saber Raine is hired to guide three elite soldiers on a rescue mission to recover a prince and princess who have been abducted from their home world. The trail leads Saber and his allies to a planet deep within uncharted space that is inhabited by strange mutated creatures.

results.title: Leslie Caron: The Reluctant Star
results.original_title: Leslie Caron, française à Hollywood, américaine à Paris
results.overview: Leslie Caron, beloved star of Gigi and An American in Paris, is one of the last witnesses to the golden age of American cinema of the mid 20th century.  Discovered by Gene Kelly when she was a teenager, she became one of the great talents in the worlds of film, dance, and theatre, still performing to this day!  The film reveals a story told through the prism of a living legend who reveals secrets of her work and life- a world of contradictions, ambitions and dreams, lived by one of its most luminous personalities.

results.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil: The Battle for Mewni
results.original_title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil: The Battle for Mewni
results.overview: Star returns to her home dimension of Mewni where she discovers that magic is disappearing throughout the kingdom. Star must dig deep and challenge archnemesis Ludo in an effort to save her family and kingdom.

results.title: How Star Wars was saved in the edit
results.original_title: How Star Wars was saved in the edit
results.overview: A video essay exploring how Star Wars' editors recut and rearranged Star Wars: A New Hope to create the cinematic classic it became.  Check out more essays at http://youtube.com/rjfilmschool  Written by David Welch (@watsonwelch)  Narrated and Edited by Joey Scoma (@joey2meals)  References:  Deleted Magic  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f2r4N...  Deleted Scenes  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f00Ik...  Harmy's Star Wars: Despecialized Edition  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dHfLX... results.title: Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic: Episode 1: A Familiar Path - Special Edition
results.original_title: Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic: Episode 1: A Familiar Path - Special Edition
results.overview: The Galactic Republic lies on the verge of collapse. Darth Malak has seized the mantle of Dark Lord and unleashed an invincible Sith armada upon an unsuspecting galaxy. As Malak's war of conquest grips the Outer Rim, a young Jedi named Bastila Shan sets forth on a dangerous journey that will change the fate of the galaxy....

results.title: Snowy Bing Bongs Across the North Star Combat Zone
results.original_title: Snowy Bing Bongs Across the North Star Combat Zone
results.overview: A performance art piece by dance-comedy trio Cocoon Central Dance Team.

results.title: Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith Special Edition
results.original_title: Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith Special Edition
results.overview: A comedic "demake" of the third Star Wars prequel film using about eight actors, poorly-made costumes, shoddy special effects, and even worse acting than the original prequels.

results.title: Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic: Episode VI: Knights and the Darkness Pt. II
results.original_title: Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic: Episode VI: Knights and the Darkness Pt. II
results.overview: Now paired with Logan Starr, the Exile has found the path she must walk. But can she do it?

results.title: The Startup: Accendi il tuo futuro
results.original_title: The Startup: Accendi il tuo futuro

results.title: The Starry Sky Above Me
results.original_title: Le Ciel étoilé au-dessus de ma tête
results.overview: 1996, Bruno publishes his first novel. He is critically acclaimed and is seen as the french John Fante. Twenty years later, Bruno is soon 50 and has not published anything since. He is single, has no children and lives with a young Femen as a roommate. For him, all goes well but his loved ones are worried and decide to take action.

results.title: The Lost Starfighter
results.original_title: The Lost Starfighter
results.overview: The misadventures of Blue Squadron as they complete their last day of training. One of Blue Two's pranks sends Blue Five to the wrong coordinates and into enemy territory.

results.title: The Truth Is in the Stars
results.original_title: The Truth Is in the Stars
results.overview: William Shatner sits down with scientists, innovators and celebrities to discuss how the optimism of 'Star Trek' influenced multiple generations.

results.title: The Slum Stars
results.original_title: The Slum Stars
results.overview: The film is about a gang of innocent abandoned kids named Kahaniya, Gudiya and Chandu who lead troubled lives in the slums. The Child trafficker Ghutan, a local don and his keep Surma, use their terror to sell these kids. Ghutan is controlled by a bogus Swami, a criminal who fakes himself as a spiritual leader. Swami is led by Netaji, a greedy politician who has an upper hand in all the crimes.  When Gudiya becomes one of the victim, forced by Surma into sexual exploitation, these kids decide to run away from these people, who are trying to destroy their lives. They somehow travel from the city through dusty roads that lead them into a village in Rajasthan where they meet a Ghost. This ghost then helps the kids to teach Ghutan, Surma, Netaji and other criminal a lesson through his powers.

results.title: Love You to the Stars and Back
results.original_title: Love You to the Stars and Back
results.overview: A girl named Mika decides to go on a road trip to look for aliens. During her trip, she accidentally bumps into Caloy whom she gives a free ride to until he reaches his destination. Mika then finds out that Caloy has cancer but despite it, he has learned to accept his fate. Both embark on a journey filled with adventures and misadventures not knowing they would fall in love with each other along the way.

results.title: Anne of Green Gables: The Good Stars
results.original_title: Anne of Green Gables: The Good Stars
